member.name: T:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO
member.summary: Marshal of AVISTREAMINFO structure. Contains information for a single stream.

member.summary: Four-character code indicating the stream type.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.fccHandler
member.summary: Four-character code of the compressor handler that will compress this video stream when it is saved.

member.summary: Applicable flags for the stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwCaps
member.summary: Capability flags; currently unused.

member.summary: Priority of the stream.

member.summary: Language of the stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwScale
member.summary: Time scale applicable for the stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwRate
member.summary: Rate in an integer format.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwStart
member.summary: Sample number of the first frame of the AVI file.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwLength
member.summary: Length of this stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwInitialFrames
member.summary: Audio skew.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwSuggestedBufferSize
member.summary: Recommended buffer size, in bytes, for the stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwQuality
member.summary: Quality indicator of the video data in the stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwSampleSize
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of a single data sample.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.rcFrame
member.summary: Dimensions of the video destination rectangle.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.dwEditCount
member.summary: Number of times the stream has been edited.

member.summary: Number of times the stream format has changed.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO.szName

member.name: T:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32
member.summary: Marshal of avifil32.dll library

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileExit
member.summary: Marshal of AVIFileExit function. Exits the AVIFile library.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileGetStream(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr@,SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.StreamType,System.Int32)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIFileGetStream function. Gets stream from AVI file.
member.param: Handle to an open AVI file.
Pointer to the new stream interface.
Four-character code indicating the type of stream to open. Zero indicates any stream can be opened.
Count of the stream type. Identifies which occurrence of the specified stream type to access.
member.returns: Returns zero if successful or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileInit
member.summary: Marshal of AVIFileInit function. Initializes the AVIFile library.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpen(System.IntPtr@,System.String,SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIFileOpen function. Opens an AVI file.
member.param: Pointer to a buffer that receives the new IAVIFile interface pointer.
String containing the name of the file to open.
Access mode to use when opening the file. The default access mode is OF_READ.

Pointer to a class identifier of the standard or custom handler you want to use. If the value is NULL, the system chooses a handler from the registry based on the file extension or the RIFF type specified in the file.
member.returns: Returns zero if successful or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileRelease(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIFileRelease function. Decrements the reference count of an AVI file interface handle and closes the file if the count reaches zero.
member.param: Handle to an open AVI file.
member.returns: Returns the reference count of the file. This return value should be used only for debugging purposes.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIStreamGetFrame(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIStreamGetFrame function. Returns the address of a decompressed video frame.
member.param: Pointer to the IGetFrame interface.
Position, in samples, within the stream of the desired frame.
member.returns: Returns a pointer to the frame data if successful or NULL otherwise.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIStreamGetFrameClose(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Marshal of AVISreamGetFrameClose function. Releases resources used to decompress video frames.
member.param: Handle returned from the AVIStreamGetFrameOpen function.
member.returns: Returns zero if successful or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIStreamGetFrameOpen(System.IntPtr,SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER@)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIStreamGetFrameOpen function. Prepares to decompress video frames from the specified video stream.
member.param: Pointer to the video stream used as the video source.
Pointer to a structure that defines the desired video format.
member.returns: Returns a GetFrame object that can be used with the AVIStreamGetFrame function.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIStreamInfo(System.IntPtr,SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AVISTREAMINFO@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIStreamInfo function. Obtains stream header information.
member.param: Handle to an open stream.
Pointer to a structure to contain the stream information.
Size, in bytes, of the structure used for psi.
member.returns: Returns zero if successful or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIStreamReadFormat(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIStreamReadFormat function. Reads the stream format data.
member.param: Handle to an open stream.
Position in the stream used to obtain the format data.
Pointer to a buffer to contain the format data.
Pointer to a location indicating the size of the memory block referenced by lpFormat.
member.returns: Returns zero if successful or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIStreamReadFormat(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.IntPtr,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIStreamReadFormat function. Reads the stream format data.
member.param: Handle to an open stream.
Position in the stream used to obtain the format data.
Pointer to a buffer to contain the format data.
Pointer to a location indicating the size of the memory block referenced by lpFormat.
member.returns: Returns zero if successful or an error otherwise.

member.name: M:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIStreamRelease(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Marshal of AVIStreamRelease function. Decrements the reference count of an AVI stream interface handle, and closes the stream if the count reaches zero.
member.param: Handle to an open stream.
member.returns: Returns the current reference count of the stream. This value should be used only for debugging purposes.

member.name: T:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError
member.summary: Error codes that can be returned by avifil32.dll functions.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError.AVIERR_OK
member.summary: No error occured.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError.AVIERR_BADFORMAT
member.summary: The file couldn't be read, indicating a corrupt file or an unrecognized format.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError.AVIERR_MEMORY
member.summary: The file could not be opened because of insufficient memory.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError.AVIERR_FILEREAD
member.summary: A disk error occurred while reading the file.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError.AVIERR_FILEOPEN
member.summary: A disk error occurred while opening the file.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError.AVIERR_NODATA
member.summary: The file does not contains requested data.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIError.REGDB_E_CLASSNOTREG
member.summary: According to the registry, the type of file does not have a handler to process it.

member.name: T:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode
member.summary: Access mode to use when opening the AVI file.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_CREATE
member.summary: Creates a new file. If the file already exists, it is truncated to zero length.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_PARSE
member.summary: Skips time-consuming operations, such as building an index. Set this flag if you want the function to return as quickly as possibleâ€”for example, if you are going to query the file properties but not read the file.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_READ
member.summary: Opens the file for reading.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_READWRITE
member.summary: Opens the file for reading and writing.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_SHARE_DENY_NONE
member.summary: Opens the file nonexclusively. Other processes can open the file with read or write access. AVIFileOpen fails if another process has opened the file in compatibility mode.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_SHARE_DENY_READ
member.summary: Opens the file nonexclusively. Other processes can open the file with write access. AVIFileOpen fails if another process has opened the file in compatibility mode or has read access to it.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_SHARE_DENY_WRITE
member.summary: Opens the file nonexclusively. Other processes can open the file with read access. AVIFileOpen fails if another process has opened the file in compatibility mode or has write access to it.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_SHARE_EXCLUSIVE
member.summary: Opens the file and denies other processes any access to it. AVIFileOpen fails if any other process has opened the file.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.AVIFileOpenMode.OF_WRITE
member.summary: Opens the file for writing.

member.name: T:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.StreamType
member.summary: Four-character codes indicating the type of stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.StreamType.ANY
member.summary: Any stream type (only to open).

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.StreamType.AUDIO
member.summary: Audio stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.StreamType.MIDI
member.summary: MIDI stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.StreamType.TEXT
member.summary: Text stream.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.AviFil32.StreamType.VIDEO
member.summary: Video stream.

member.name: T:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER
member.summary: Marshal of BITMAPINFOHEADER structure

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biSize
member.summary: Specifies the size of the structure, in bytes.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biWidth
member.summary: Specifies the width of the bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biHeight
member.summary: Specifies the height of the bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biPlanes
member.summary: Specifies the number of planes for the target device.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biBitCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of bits per pixel.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biCompression
member.summary: Specifies the type of compression for a compressed bottom-up bitmap (top-down DIBs cannot be compressed).

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biSizeImage
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of the image.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biXPelsPerMeter
member.summary: Specifies the horizontal resolution, in pixels per meter, of the target device for the bitmap.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biYPelsPerMeter
member.summary: Specifies the vertical resolution, in pixels per meter, of the target device for the bitmap.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biClrUsed
member.summary: Specifies the number of color indexes in the color table that are actually used by the bitmap.

member.name: F:SARA.Avi.AviMarshal.BITMAPINFOHEADER.biClrImportant
member.summary: Specifies the number of color indexes required for displaying the bitmap.
